title: windows executable does not build properly
body:
What steps will reproduce the problem?
1. build any go program
2. run it

What is the expected output?
I expect to see program do what it does.

What do you see instead?
error message: The application failed to initialize properly (0xc0000005). Click on OK
to terminate the application.

What is your $GOOS?  $GOARCH?
windows, 386

Which revision are you using?  (hg identify)
changeset:   6131:54c9dc577c56             
user:        Luuk van Dijk <lvd@golang.org>
date:        Mon Aug 30 22:20:38 2010 +0200
summary:     8l: emit DWARF in ELF.        

Please provide any additional information below.
I suspect change in 6131 makes pe structure of executable file inconsistent.
